text: Harasewychia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Harasewychia include: * Harasewychia harasewychi Petuch, 1987 ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Harasewychia
